attributes.action: Give local govenment workers at least the rate of inflation pay rise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The local govenment minister should offer all local authority workers a pay rise of at least the "rate of inflation"and not 2.45%.
With soring food fuel and every day living costs we need a increase of at least 3.5%
Some local authority council workers are the lowest paid in england
